Title: Bates Motel
Writer: Anthony Cipriano, Carlton Cuse, Kerry Ehrin
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: A contemporary prequel to Psycho, giving a portrayal of how Norman Bates' psyche unravels through his teenage years, and how deeply intricate his relationship with his mother, Norma, truly is.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 5 wins & 61 nominations.
